name: Fansus - Clarity Ascension
author: Amets Estibariz
description: Adds a Beauty/Clarity Ascension, based off of the First Fansus.
description_long: Adds a new Beauty/Clarity ascension involving the Apple-of-the-Eye, one of the Hours of the First Fansus. Begin your ascent by Fancying your Passion, or return to the base ambitions by Fancying Temptation/Dedication/Ascension: Beauty.
